</ float >

Showcasing music and art made using and mis-using technology.

Concerts, exhibitions, workshops, meetups and more.

By weirdos, for weirdos.

Float Collective

An open collective for anyone who identifies as queer or as belonging to a marginalised gender interested in creative technology.

We meet on the 5th of every month, 17.30 - 19.30, at various venues in Huddersfield.

Meet ups usually include some kind of activity, e.g a presentation, skill share, small performance or themed discussion.

We are always on the lookout for new members! Whether you're interested in creative coding, game development, digital art, or anything else under the banner of 'creative technology', please feel free to come along.

Get Involved:

Want to present at a meet up?

Have a project you want to share? A technical problem you could use some help with? Or an issue you'd really like to discuss?

Meet Ups are a relaxed environment to get feedback, and you don't need to have been before to present.

Fill in the Google Form below, and we'll be in touch.
